roleset.name: quip for war

MILITARIZATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

role.descr: military presence arg2 is equiped with (troops, weapons, etc.)

example.name: militarize-v
example.text: You who watch as budgets are cut in education and health care while you militarize a police force ?

example.name: militarization-n
example.text: and people are critical of their "militarization", with helmets and body armor and such.
example.arg: with helmets and body armor and such
